ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception
ygData.msgSnippet: Tested it this morning in Neriak. I have no problems using it. I get the Ultravision tinge. I started up accelerando, then turned off accelerando. Still had
ygData.messageBody:
Tested it this morning in Neriak. I have no problems using it. I get the
Ultravision tinge. I started up accelerando, then turned off accelerando.
Still had the blue tinge.

So it works fine for me as well.

Windleaf, 28th level balladeer, Half Elf, Bertox.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: joseph [mailto:jmounts@...]

>
>
> From: joseph <jmounts@...>
>
> I have the Mask of Deception, and the ultravision (everything is
> bluish/purplish) works fine. :)
